overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by domicile and permanent residence.
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually by April 30 for individuals and businesses.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Personal allowance of 1,200 EUR per year.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 18.5% of gross income (shared between employer and employee).

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

inheritance_tax.rate: 3% for direct heirs, 6% for distant heirs.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must be employed by a company outside of Montenegro and earn at least 2,300 EUR per month.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Flat tax of 9% on personal income.

special_economic_zones.name: Bar Special Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: 0% corporate tax for the first 10 years, 50% reduction for the following 5 years.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and dividends.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from crypto mining is taxed as business income.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from crypto are taxed at the personal income tax rate.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFT sales is taxed as business income.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFTs are taxed at the personal income tax rate.

additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 55th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
